VinylMaster CUT V5

Basic Vinyl Cutting Software

Buy Now
Upgrade To V5

Download FREE Demo
Previous Page / Previous Page / VinylMaster CUT V5
Overview
Features
Compare
Upgrade
Free Demo
System Requirements
Feel at ease as you learn the program, gain confidence in your skills with help from our tools & features, built in help manual and our tutorials & lessons.
Create, design and lay out your DIY artwork and creative projects in our exceptionally user-friendly atmosphere and at an affordable price.
Sending your artwork to a Vinyl or Die Cutter (Laser and ARMS Cutters) is simple and quick to help you save time.

All Good Ideas Start Somewhere,
Start Here with VinylMaster CUT!

Start your design journey the right way with VinylMaster CUT, our
first level of our VinylMaster software. Packed with a suite of tools and features, this edition is designed for;
simple sign making using a vinyl cutter, allows you to produce vinyl lettering, logos and
pin-striping. VinylMaster CUT comes with text, curve and object tools and fully supports
ARMS and Laser cutters for all your contour cutting needs.

CUT Key Features to Help Start Your Design Journey

Plugins & Modules
User Interface
Drawing
Effects
Fill & Pen Styles
Image Filters & Special FX
Vinyl Cutting
Vinyl Cutter Tools

See What Other Tools & Features VinylMaster CUT Has!

With VinylMaster CUT’s suite of tools & features, it is designed to be enjoyed
and utilised by diverse designers, industries and businesses worldwide.

Drawing

Easily create an outline around effects, images, objects, shapes, text and more, using the create cut-contour module. Feel at ease as the module applies registration marks to each color for easy alignment on-site and is supported by all major makes and models with a laser pointer or ARMS system fitted for contour cutting.

Contour Cutting Tools

Curves drawn directly with the mouse or freestyle pen onto the drawing area are automatically improved by the program by smoothing out the pen stroke once the stroke is completed.

Vinyl Cutting

Curves drawn directly with the mouse or freestyle pen onto the drawing area are automatically improved by the program by smoothing out the pen stroke once the stroke is completed.

Fill/Pen Easy Color Location

Quickly find and replace colors in any shape, line or object to ensure color accuracy for printing and keep branding consistent.

Project Management

Quickly find and replace colors in any shape, line or object to ensure color accuracy for printing and keep branding consistent.

Display Modes

Quickly find and replace colors in any shape, line or object to ensure color accuracy for printing and keep branding consistent.

Looking for More? Maybe it’s Time to Change to Another Level!

VinylMaster LTR is part of a powerful group of levels, with their own suite of tools & features,
they are designed perfectly for all your design needs and expectations.


Unlock more creative features for; vinyl lettering, logos, signage, decals, posters and more!
And/or for the ultimate vector illustration, page layout, photo editing, typography,
and professional print capabilities, upgrade to another level of VinylMaster.

See the Full VinylMaster Level Comparison List

System Requirements

To operate the Software successfully the following computer configuration is required:

    Minimum Computer Configuration
  • IBM Compatible 1Ghz CPU
  • 4Gb of available Hard Disk Drive space (includes Extras, add 2.5Gb for the Lessons)
  • 2Gb of RAM
  • SVGA color monitor set to a min 1280×768 pixels
  • 512Mb SVGA Video/Graphics card
  • 2 Button Mouse
  • Microsoft Windows 7, 8, 10 or 11 (32/64Bit)
    Recommended Computer Configuration
  • Intel/AMD Quad-Core+
  • 10Gb+ of available Hard Disk Drive space
  • 16Gb+ of RAM
  • 24”+ HD Color monitor (1980 Pixels+ Wide) x 2
  • 4Gb+ Video/Graphics card
  • 2 Button Scrolling Wheel Mouse
  • Sound & Speakers
  • Microsoft Windows 10 Pro (64Bit)

it Anymore? Lets Upgrade!

productIntro.bodyText:
Start your design journey the right way with VinylMaster CUT, our
first level of our VinylMaster software. Packed with a suite of tools and features, this edition is designed for;
simple sign making using a vinyl cutter, allows you to produce vinyl lettering, logos and
pin-striping. VinylMaster CUT comes with text, curve and object tools and fully supports
ARMS and Laser cutters for all your contour cutting needs.
productIntro.header:
All Good Ideas Start Somewhere, 
Start Here with VinylMaster CUT!

gallery.bodyText: Easily create an outline around effects, images, objects, shapes, text and more, using the create cut-contour module. Feel at ease as the module applies registration marks to each color for easy alignment on-site and is supported by all major makes and models with a laser pointer or ARMS system fitted for contour cutting.
Curves drawn directly with the mouse or freestyle pen onto the drawing area are automatically improved by the program by smoothing out the pen stroke once the stroke is completed.

Interactive Send to Cut and Vinyl Spooler that supports auto-mark and will easily calibrate your cutter, laser pointer and ARMS cutter. Feel at ease as it will help to quickly guide you to print and cut on 2 devices or to print, laminate and cut on the same device.
Quickly find and replace colors in any shape, line or object to ensure color accuracy for printing and keep branding consistent.
Don't stress as VinylMaster saves your work as you work by using flash backups, autosaves files, fonts, images and dependent files.

Instantly switch between our select range of display modes available; Simple Wireframe, Wireframe, Cuttable, Enhanced (default) and Preflight Print, to find a display that suits your workspace preference.

systemRequirements.recommendedComputerConfiguration: 24”+ HD Color monitor (1980 Pixels+ Wide) x 2

iconForFeature.bodyText: Create Super Smooth Polycurves and Conic Sections using technically superior: Rational Quadratic B Spline Curves which remain fully editable along the full length of the curve i.e. you can go back and node edit the curve as you're creating it!
Create perfectly horizontal and vertical lines, inc. to any angle with an auto-join feature. Ideal for making fold lines and developing geometric shapes
Curves drawn with the mouse or a pen (freestyle) directly onto the drawing area and automatically smoothed by the program once completed
Flag, 2D Perspective and Cylinder
Apply an Outline by measurement (units) as a separate contour
Adjust Temperature, Saturation, Brightness and Gamma. Set to Greyscale and Reset
Create an Outline around Effects, Images, Objects, Shapes and Text etc. using the Create Cut-Contour module, and now traces very large and complex images with ease!
Find groups of related tools now in an easy to use set of specialist Tool Panels on the right side of the program for much easier and repaid design
Easily switch between documents with Document tabs rather than using a menu item
VinylMaster is set out in a logical and easy to follow layout and uses a highly professional and contemporary Graphics User Interface (GUI) meaning that it's easy to use and to understand

Do most operations in the main designing window with clever live and interactive editing tools (Gizmos) rather than wading through too many pop-up modules which are confusing and hard to find when you most need them
Prevents the Plotter/Vinyl Cutter from Rounding-off Corners and stopping short of completing the cut. Ideal for small text and intricate designs
Comprehensive and dedicated Device Settings module to set and adjust a large number of advanced settings such as Emulation Commands/Language, Units, Origin etc.
Minimize the Plotter's Travel
Extends the Cut just past the start point to compensate for a Cutter's Trailing Blade
Minimizes cutter movement and wear

Interactive Contour Cutting Wizard that supports Auto-Mark (Auto-Detect) Cutters and Laser Pointer Cutters to quickly guide you to Print and Cut on 2 Devices or to Print, Laminate and then Cut on the same device. Easily calibrate your laser pointer and work with rotated artwork
New preset cutting tools/contours, ability to create perforation cuts and fold lines
Easily create an Outline around Effects, Images, Objects, Shapes and Text etc. using the Create Cut-Contour module
Supports all major makes and models which Detect printed Alignment Marks, so you can print from a device then cut from another, or print, laminate and then cut on the one device
Supports all major and popular ARMS (laser sensor) and CCD (camera fitted) cutters for the most accurate of contour cutting
